Articles.Content:
Well, the according to the wiki, Eve has no known easter eggs. Can anyone confirm? It seems like Eve might just be under-explored.

Has anyone considered doing a search of it (either a plane or even an airship)?

So far the only thing of interest that I've found is a little rock who seems very indifferent to Eve's strong gravity:
Hard to confirm the absence of something. Just because you can't see it doesn't mean it's not there, but neither does it mean it is there.

There are no Easter eggs on Eve, as Nova has confirmed that we found them all. And please note the floating rocks are NOT Easter eggs. Easter eggs are strange, anomalous objects. Not bugs or glitches.
As stated, there has never been an easter egg on Eve. But that can, and probably will change before release. It might even be the perfect place for the next clue to Duna's SSTV signal.
If you have Kerb Town, you can have a 3rd party easter egg on Eve

And please note the floating rocks are NOT Easter eggs.

They're still probably pretty baffling to Kerbal science
